title: Revert homepage hero image asset reference

requirements.summary: Revert the HomePage hero image src to the previous generated static asset while keeping 564x483 dimensions and avoiding broken-image rendering.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx, the hero src points to /assets/generated/phoenix-1988-image-3.dim_564x483.png.
The homepage loads successfully and displays the hero image at 564x483 without a missing-asset/broken image icon.
No other pages (checkout/KYC flow, book covers, admin pages) are changed as part of this update.

file_operations.description: Update the hero to use the previous static asset path /assets/generated/phoenix-1988-image-3.dim_564x483.png (replacing /assets/generated/home-hero-replacement.dim_564x483.png), keeping the existing width/height styling at 564x483 to prevent layout shifts and broken-image issues.
